Compatible with iOS 10

Makes the Spotify artwork fullscreen.

Configure options from Settings.

- Add a restart Spotify button in the settings pane - Compatibility with latest Spotify release (Thanks to Justin Dixon for pointing it out) You spoke, I listened!
- Now includes preferences section in the Settings app so you can choose exactly which elements are hidden.


Per user requests, these items have been removed from the now playing view for a cleaner look.

- "Now Playing From..." at the top center
- Next up queue button at the top right
- "Devices available" at the bottom center

Keep the feedback/requests coming! Bug fixes are still planned.
Fixes:
- Full Mitsuha compatibility

Known Bugs (will be fixed):
- Initial artwork sizing incorrect (before hitting play)
- Partial ColorFlow 3 compatibility
- iPad sizing issues


Shoutout to /u/Gh0stByte for helping with code

Fixes:
- Fixed artwork aspect ratio on certain devices
